thread.title: 7 Jackets You'll Need to Battle Late Winter and Early Spring Weather
thread.title_full: 7 Jackets You'll Need to Battle Late Winter and Early Spring Weather

title: 7 Jackets You'll Need to Battle Late Winter and Early Spring Weather

organizations.name: philosophy di lorenzo serafini long sleeve belted corduroy jacket

text:
Balenciaga Oversized Satin Bomber Jacket, $1,395; net-a-porter.com 8 Of 23 That '70s Jacket 
The '70s is continuing its streak as the most wearable (and fun) decade to be inspired by. Need-to-try styles range from safari jackets to ones with oversized lapels, but think of it this way: if unsung style hero Mila-Kunis-as-Jackie on That '70s Show would wear it, then so should you. 
Philosophy Di Lorenzo Serafini Long Sleeve Belted Corduroy Jacket, $1,435; modaoperandi.com Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
